This does work. Although you have to extract the ISO from the Rar and then extract the files and folders from the ISO. After all that I found my files ended with ;1 and because of that they would not show up. Delete all the ;1's from your pc or rename them in Multiman. It was kinda a pain and idk why I didnt download one of the other versions but when its all said and done, it works perfectly!
